prompts: Create a powerful ice-type Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience in its design.
Imagine a bear-like creature with snow-white fur and icy blue accents for a winter-themed Pokemon.
Show me a Pokemon that features large claws and a fierce expression, perfect for a battle setting.
Design a majestic ice Pokemon that roams the snowy mountains, showcasing its icy abilities.
Generate a friendly bear Pokemon that loves to play in the snow and is adored by trainers.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a giant, fluffy polar bear with unique frosty features.
Give me an ice-type Pokemon that can control snowstorms and has a strong presence.
